text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse @vp say COVID-19 will be zero & done by Memorial Day in 5 days with their Disinformation Campaign. Charts say otherwise. Who is lying? China, the charts, or #ConManTrump who has made 18,000 false or misleading claims in 1,170 days? #DonaldDeath https://t.co/nrzPd9eNRK
